com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.layout
Class RowLayout

java.lang.Object
  com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.Layout
      com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.layout.RowLayout

public class RowLayout
extends Layout

This layout positions the container's children in a single horiztonal or vertical row. Unlike FillLayout, each child widget can be configured using an associated RowData.

See Also:
RowData

Field Summary
 int margin
          The number of pixels of margin that will be placed along the edges of the layout (default is 0).
 int spacing
          The number of pixels between the edge of one cell and the edge of its neighbouring cell (default value is 0).
 Style.Orientation type
          Specifies how widgets will be positioned within the layout (default value is VERTICAL).

Field Detail

type

public Style.Orientation type
Specifies how widgets will be positioned within the layout (default value is VERTICAL).

Possible values are:

  • HORIZONTAL: Position the widgets horizontally from left to right
  • VERTICAL: Position the widgets vertically from top to bottom

margin

public int margin
The number of pixels of margin that will be placed along the edges of the layout (default is 0).

spacing

public int spacing
The number of pixels between the edge of one cell and the edge of its neighbouring cell (default value is 0).
